name: Scotch & Soda | Khaki Chino Bowie
description: Rock your day with this classic chino. Bowie is a slim fit pants with slant pockets and a subtle belt for a finished look. With a wide range of colours there is one for every mood and occasion.

name: Scotch & Soda | Dahlia Chino Bowie
description: Rock your day with this classic chino. Bowie is a slim fit pants with slant pockets and a subtle belt for a finished look. With a wide range of colours there is one for every mood and occasion.

name: Scotch & Soda | Night Chino Bowie
description: Rock your day with this classic chino. Bowie is a slim fit pants with slant pockets and a subtle belt for a finished look. With a wide range of colours there is one for every mood and occasion.

name: Scotch & Soda | Deep blush Chino Bowie
description: Rock your day with this classic chino. Bowie is a slim fit pants with slant pockets and a subtle belt for a finished look. With a wide range of colours there is one for every mood and occasion.

name: G-STAR | Jean Arc 3D Loose tapered
description:
G-star Jean arc 3D loose tapered 
NÂ°50223.4274.071
Color : medium aged

ARC design that incorporates multi-dimensionality and articulation into a garment designed for motion. The pant features a drop-crotch, low slung pockets, and torqued seams that follow the contour of the leg, in a tapered fit. This design comes in a clean and constructed medium weight and medium aged indigo denim.

name: G-Star High Top Trainer | Valvassor
description: Cool 80s navy leather & suede hightop!

name: G-Star Trainer | Tracer
description: White vinyl grey suede 70s retro trainer. Wear with skinny jeans or chinos.

name: G-Star Boat Shoes | Rudder
description: Grey suede deck shoe! With green sole and tan leather laces! Great with chinos or shorts!

name: Grenson Shoes | Alfred
description: Alfred is Sharp in black but with a natural sole edge

name: Grenson Shoes | Silas Chocolate
description: Crafted from fine suede and featuring wooden and leather soles, this pair is built for comfort and effortless cool. Wear them with a blazer and fitted jeans for casual business lunches.

name: G-Star Trainer | Yard Bullion (Black)
description: Basketball inspired trainers with lace up and velcro fastening made up of leather and textile. Strong G-Star RAW apparel DNA & Leather and textile uppers with a unique cupsole.

name: G-Star Trainer | Yard Bullion (Grey)
description: Basketball inspired trainers with lace up and velcro fastening made up of leather and textile. Strong G-Star RAW apparel DNA & Leather and textile uppers with a unique cupsole.

name: G-Star Shoes | Samovar Nylon
description: Hi-Top trainers with diamond quilt nylon and suede uppers. Unique cupsoles & Strong G-Star apparel DNA with quilted ankle.

name: G-Star Shoes | Augur Laszlo
description: Mid-height leather and textile trainers with lace up fastening. Strong G-Star RAW apparel DNA. Leather and textile uppers with a unique cupsole.

name: G-Star Shoes | Breaker McNeil
description: Lo-cut suede sneaker with lace up fastening and pull tab on heel. Unique vulcanised contrast colour sole with G-Star RAW logo on the tongue.

name: Grenson Shoes | Spike (Tan)
description: Our nod to the wonderful "duckboot", this is the Grenson version. Made from burnished calf with a white wedge sole. This truly is a unique boot.

name: Grenson Shoes | Sid (Black Brogue)
description: Sid is commonly known as a Royal Brogue, but used to be called a Galosh Brogue in Northamptonshire and is also known as a Long Wing in the USA.  All good names and all meaning that this is a classic wing tip except that the wing runs the length of the shoe to the back strap instead of dipping down into the welt like its more common brother.  Made from calf grain with a double sole and split welt, this shoe has become an instant Grenson classic.

name: Grenson Shoes | Fred V (Black)
description: As with Archie, we took the upper of Fred and stuck a modern light weight wedge sole on it. It makes Fred comfy and light and creates a whole new look. British workwear meets American workwear.

name: Grenson Shoes | Fred V (Tan)
description: As with Archie, we took the upper of Fred and stuck a lovely big white sole on it. It makes Fred comfy and light and creates a whole new look. British workwear meets American workwear.

name: Grenson Shoes | Sid (Burgundy Brogue)
description: Sid is commonly known as a Royal Brogue, but used to be called a Galosh Brogue in Northamptonshire and is also known as a Long Wing in the USA. All good names and all meaning that this is a classic wing tip except that the wing runs the length of the shoe to the back strap instead of dipping down into the welt like its more common brother. Made from calf grain with a double sole and split welt, this shoe has become an instant Grenson classic.

name: Grenson Shoes | Archie V (Black)
description:
Rubber Wedge

Archie, with a white wedge sole is a hybrid shoe. We have taken the upper from the original Archie and planted a big but light weight wedge sole on it. Its looks amazing but best of all they are so comfortable to wear you will never take them off.

name: Grenson Shoes | Archie V (Tan)
description:
Rubber Wedge

Archie, with a white wedge sole is a hybrid shoe. We have taken the upper from the original Archie and planted a big but light weight wedge sole on it. Its looks amazing but best of all they are so comfortable to wear you will never take them off.

name: Grenson Shoes | Dylan Tan
description: Along with a pair of black Oxfords, suede loafers and Chelsea boots, tan-coloured brogues are among the shoes that every man should own. Lighter than our trusty Archies and slim like the fit of your jeans or the cut of your blue suit trousers - both of which they match - the Dylan will go anywhere and with anything. Even into town or, dare we say, with a shorts suit. (We do.)

name: Grenson Shoes | Fred V (Brown)
description: As with Archie, we took the upper of Fred and stuck a modern light weight wedge sole on it. It makes Fred comfy and light and creates a whole new look. British workwear meets American workwear.

name: Grenson Shoes | Lewis V
description: This is a classic brogue boot upper but unlined and made from soft calf suede, so that its perfect for the summer. The sole is lightweight, which makes the boot so comfortable to walk in that you might just wear them all year round.

name: Grenson Shoes | Sharp
description: Here is a simple concept, take the most popular shoes in the collection and make them ultra lightweight by using nubuck for the uppers and red micro for the soles. What you get is a classic shoe that is both lighweight and casual and ideal to wear with denim or chinos, all year round

name: Grenson Shoes | Sid (Black)
description: Be nothing but a gentlemen and exude timeless style in a pair of highest quality leather brogues by trusted brand Grenson; featuring punched detailing, contrast lace-up front and a low stacked heel.

name: Grenson Shoes | Sid (Brown)
description: Be nothing but a gentlemen and exude timeless style in a pair of highest quality leather brogues by trusted brand Grenson; featuring punched detailing, contrast lace-up front and a low stacked heel.

name: Grenson Shoes | Sid (Tan)
description: Be nothing but a gentlemen and exude timeless style in a pair of highest quality leather brogues by trusted brand Grenson; featuring punched detailing, contrast lace-up front and a low stacked heel.

name: Grenson Shoes | Silas (Navy)
description: The Desert boot comes in many forms but its true origins are from the design of the English Chukka. Silas is a simple, plain chukka in soft suede with a single leather sole and two blind eyelets.

name: Hudson Shoes | Anta (Brown)
description:
A High Summer slip on espadrille with woven rope detail, new for SS12.

Taking an idea and running with it, we love an Espadrille here at Hudson! Deconstructing a classic and producing it in suede we have come up with this tidy little offering for the boys this Summer...available in stone and brown.

name: Hudson Shoes | Anta (Stone)
description:
A High Summer slip on espadrille with woven rope detail, new for SS12.

Taking an idea and running with it, we love an Espadrille here at Hudson! Deconstructing a classic and producing it in suede we have come up with this tidy little offering for the boys this Summer...available in stone and brown.

name: Hudson Shoes | Cabana (Brown)
description: Taking inspiration from the East; this woven Deck Shoe ready for the Sunshine. This great mens summer addition will take you through lazy city weekends and holidays by the beach.

name: Mustard Accessories | Black Wallet
description: Black Leather Wallet By Mustard Accessories.

name: Scotch & Soda | Blue Ray Brewer Jeans With Braces
description:
For the man who wants something different every once in a while, these coated red cast denim jeans are designed. They come with detachable suspender belts, to complete your hipster look.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Dark Denim Mailer Loose Taper
description: This jean is thoroughly hand worked to get all the great character of heavy wear, but lightly washed to preserve the rich, inky indigo color. Featuring a mirror finishing, these jeans come with a lucky wooden coin.

name: Scotch & Soda | Denim Chino
description:
The most casual way to create a dressed look. The denim chino features all the classic details, updated with a medium stonewash and temporary garment crush.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Denim Dean
description:
An extraordinary pair of jeans for the extraordinary guy. These loosely tapered 5-pocket jeans have a lot of special details, like a special re-patched knee insert, paint spots and a lucky wooden coin.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Grey Amsterdams Blauw Tee
description:
A bold graphic logo gives this Amsterdams Blauw tee statement-making style in your wardrobe. Crafted from a cotton slub quality, this low crew neck has contrasting bindings.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Navy Faded Western Shirt
description:
Your favourite fabric can do double-duty. This essential denim shirt with faded and light dirty effects is the proof, delivered with a lucky charm.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & soda | Indigo Blue Polo With Pochet
description:
An indigo blue polo that has been bleach washed and sprayed. The pochet gives it a fancy outlook and makes it suitable for a day at the office.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Light Blue Long-Sleeved Shirt With Pochet
description:
This casual shirt is made classic with a pochet in the chest pocket. Therefore it is a great shirt for different occasions like work or a night out.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & soda | Blue & White Stripes Long-Sleeved Shirt With Pochet
description:
This casual shirt is made classic with a pochet in the chest pocket. Therefore it is a great shirt for different occasions like work or a night out.

What it's made of: 100% cotton

name: Scotch & Soda | Barfly Fragrance
